title: Allow all the screenshots to be added at once, including language metadata
body: At the moment you have to add the, up to 8 screenshots, one at a time. Since computers were invented to save time, I suggest we be allowed to upload them all in one zip file - using numbering for the file names and the portal could place them in the right order. Allow rearranging if the user wants to change them!

comments.body:
When i add a language to a package (for example, PT right now) and upload it to the store, it requires me to fully complete PT, PT-BR and PT-PT in the store descriptions.
How come i can't just set PT strings and use them in all PT regions ? My package only contains PT culture in the manifest.
I agree with the idea, maybe not with the implementation.
I don't agree. you can select all images at once, and send them in single request!
I think there should be one "source" graphic, which automatically becomes the dafualt graphic for all languages, unless replaced with another one in localised versions.
